mapper.sql: id, car_brand, so_id, car_type, temperature, gpstime, station, create_time, update_time
mapper.update:
UPDATE car_history_data
car_brand = #{carBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
so_id = #{soId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
car_type = #{carType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
temperature = #{temperature,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
gpstime = #{gpstime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
station = #{station,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
